## hpr1800 :: YouTube Video Subscriptions

 
Although my wife and I have a Cable TV subscription, I have maintained I could give it up easily because so much of what I am interested in is online anyway. For many people that might mean Netflix or Hulu, but for me it means YouTube. This is the golden age of narrow-casting, as opposed to broadcasting, because YouTube gives so many creators the opportunity to find their own audience for things that dont appeal to the masses.
For more go to https://www.palain.com/?p=243


Links:


https://www.patreon.com/

https://vidcon.com/

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crash_Course_%28YouTube%29

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SciShow

https://www.palain.com/?p=243
